ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

cookingTips: Pound chicken breasts to ½-inch thickness for even cooking
Crush French-fried onions just before breading to preserve maximum crunch
Bake at 375°F for 20-25 minutes until golden and internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This recipe uses a simple breading technique. Guide the cook through the dredging process and explain why crushing the onions fresh matters for texture and flavor.
